summary: The customer was interested in setting up an account with Contoso Wireless and the agent was able to help them with that. The customer opted for the 1 Gbps internet package, which costs $99.99/month plus taxes and fees. The package includes unlimited data usage, access to Contoso Wireless Hotspots, access to the online customer portal, and 24/7 customer support. To sign up for the package, the customer can either visit the website or call 800-555-1234 and a representative will assist them in getting set up with their new service.
